#summary Bot Feature List

== Features ==

Heres a few of the bot's features:
  * Access System
  * Scripting System with alot of <a href="http://code.google.com/p/fail-bot/w/list?can=2&q=event&colspec=PageName+Summary+Changed+ChangedBy">Events</a>
  * Individual Whisper Windows
  * Support to set email, change email, and reset password
  * Preview channels before you join!
  * Support for iTunes and Winamp
  * InBot Queue
  * Filters
  * FULL PingSpoofing support
and much more!
